name: Music_4951.wav
keywords: ['mexican folk music', 'live performance', 'male voice', 'shouting', 'accordion', 'bass guitar', 'acoustic guitar', 'acoustic drums', 'lively', 'vibrant']
caption: This is a Mexican folk music piece being performed live. There is male voice shouting at the end of the piece. The accordion is playing the main melody. The acoustic guitar and the bass guitar are playing in the background. The rhythmic background consists of a latin acoustic drum beat. The atmosphere is lively. This piece could be playing in the background at a Mexican restaurant.
